resources.string: Subscriptions are recurring. You will be automatically be billed through your Google Play Store Account. Your subscription will auto-renew unless you cancel. You can manage your subscription in the settings in the Google Play Store

Showing examples of all in-app purchases using the latest Google Play Billing Library, The app has covered
----------------

1: Multiple subscriptions.

2: One time purchase (Non-Consumable purchase).

3: Unlimited purchases (Consumable purchases).

5: Remove Ads purchase.

6: Restore owned purchase button.

7: Auto subscription check and activate.

The source code has the following cover.
----------------

1: Multiple subscriptions.

2: One time purchase (Non-Consumable purchase).

3: Unlimited purchases (Consumable purchases).

5: Remove Ads purchase.

6: Restore owned purchase button.

7: Auto subscription check and activate.

Once you buy the Source Code, A Download button will be shown below to Download the Complete App Source Code and you own it for lifetime. Free Future updates will be provided.

This screen is showing different product types. 
----------------

1: subscriptions.

2: One time purchase (Non-Consumable purchase).

3: Unlimited purchases (Consumable purchases).

This screen is showing different product types. 
----------------

1: subscriptions.

2: One time purchase (Non-Consumable purchase).

3: Unlimited purchases (Consumable purchases).
